47 /* BIOS Include Files */
48 #include <ti/sysbios/BIOS.h>
49 #include <ti/sysbios/knl/Semaphore.h>
50 #include <ti/sysbios/knl/Task.h>
51 #include <ti/sysbios/knl/Clock.h>
52 #include <ti/sysbios/knl/Mailbox.h>
53 
54 /* mmWave Link Include File */
55 #include <ti/control/mmwavelink/mmwavelink.h>
56 
65 rlInt32_t Osal_mutexCreate(rlOsiMutexHdl_t* mutexHdl, rlInt8_t* name)
66 {
67  Semaphore_Handle semHandle;
68  Semaphore_Params params;
69  int32_t errCode = 0;
70 
71  /* Initialize and create the semaphore: */
72  Semaphore_Params_init(&params);
73  params.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
74  semHandle = Semaphore_create(1, &params, NULL);
75  if (semHandle == NULL)
76  errCode = -1;
77 
78  /* Populate the Mutex Handle */
79  *mutexHdl = (rlOsiMutexHdl_t*)semHandle;
80  return errCode;
81 }
82 
91 rlInt32_t Osal_mutexLock(rlOsiMutexHdl_t* mutexHdl, rlOsiTime_t timeout)
92 {
93  Semaphore_pend((Semaphore_Handle)(*mutexHdl), timeout);
94  return 0;
95 }
96 
105 rlInt32_t Osal_mutexUnlock(rlOsiMutexHdl_t* mutexHdl)
106 {
107  Semaphore_post((Semaphore_Handle)(*mutexHdl));
108  return 0;
109 }
110 
119 rlInt32_t Osal_mutexDelete(rlOsiMutexHdl_t* mutexHdl)
120 {
121  Semaphore_delete((Semaphore_Handle*)mutexHdl);
122  return 0;
123 }
124 
133 rlInt32_t Osal_semCreate(rlOsiSemHdl_t* semHdl, rlInt8_t* name)
134 {
135  Semaphore_Handle semHandle;
136  Semaphore_Params params;
137  int32_t errCode = 0;
138 
139  /* Initialize and create the semaphore: */
140  Semaphore_Params_init(&params);
141  params.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
142  semHandle = Semaphore_create(1, &params, NULL);
143  if (semHandle == NULL)
144  errCode = -1;
145 
146  /* Populate the Mutex Handle */
147  *semHdl = (rlOsiSemHdl_t*)semHandle;
148  return errCode;
149 }
150 
159 rlInt32_t Osal_semWait(rlOsiSemHdl_t* semHdl, rlOsiTime_t timeout)
160 {
161  Semaphore_pend((Semaphore_Handle)(*semHdl), timeout);
162  return 0;
163 }
164 
173 rlInt32_t Osal_semSignal(rlOsiSemHdl_t* semHdl)
174 {
175  Semaphore_post((Semaphore_Handle)(*semHdl));
176  return 0;
177 }
178 
187 rlInt32_t Osal_semDelete(rlOsiSemHdl_t* semHdl)
188 {
189  Semaphore_delete((Semaphore_Handle*)semHdl);
190  return 0;
191 }
192 
202 rlInt32_t Osal_delay(rlUInt32_t delay)
203 {
204  Task_sleep(delay);
205  return 0;
206 }
